    • Constructor Detail

      • ISI

        public ISI(java.lang.String h,
   int p,
   java.lang.String stat,
   int procid,
   int to,
   int sndsize,
   int rcvsize,
   int throttle,
   java.lang.String tg,
   java.lang.String bind,
   EdgeThread parent)
        create new instance of an ISI link
        Parameters:
        h - host string to contact
        p - Port on that host with a ISI server
        stat - The station or more practically the loop name
        procid - The process id to use to set up the IACP
        to - The time out interval in seconds for the IACP
        sndsize - The buffer send size for the IACP
        rcvsize - The buffer rcv size for the IACP
        throttle - The throttle b/s to be enforced by the IACP
        tg - The uniqued tag to use for this connection
        bind - Bind address
        parent - The parent to log through.

      • doISI

        public void doISI(int payloadID,
         java.nio.ByteBuffer buf,
         int len)
        This call back routine is called by the IACP handler with each packet targeted to ISI (payloadID 1000-1999)
        Parameters:
        payloadID - The payload ID
        buf - The byteBuffer with the data packet
        len - THe length of the data in buf

      • doRawPacket

               int len)

                    throws java.io.IOException

        java.io.IOException

      • sendSeqRequest

        public void sendSeqRequest(int sig,
                  long seq,
                  int sig2,
                  long seq2)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        this starts up a request for the newest data in perpetuity
        Parameters:
        sig - the signature
        seq - The sequence to request
        sig2 - Upper end signature
        seq2 - the Upper end sequence
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the send to ISI server does so

      • isiHeartbeat

        public void isiHeartbeat()

      • isiConnection

        public void isiConnection()
        this is the callback entry from the IACP called when the connection is first made

      • isiAlert

        public void isiAlert(int code,
            java.lang.String msg)
        this is the callback endtry from IACP to pass Alerts back
        Parameters:
        code - The alert code
        msg - The alert message
